data.title: NEWS – tangren.film
data.text:
NEWS

All

CORPORATE NEWS

MOVIE NEWS

How to Quit Love? Promo Song of Fall in Love at First Kiss Tries to Crack this Tough Nut

With Valentine’s Day approaching, the highly anticipated romantic film Fall in Love at First Kiss is coming along to the cinemas. Few days ago, a promo song of the film called “100 ways to dislike you” is released. The song is sung by The Landlord’s Cat, a Chinese folk music band that features the soft […]

Fall in Love at First Kiss — “Thank You for Coming into My Life”

The IP film Fall in Love at First Kiss directed by Yushan Chen, will be in theatres of United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia and New Zealand at the same time on Valentine’s Day. Xiangqin Yuan (Yun Lin) and Zhishu Jiang (Dalu Wang) The Odds of Two People Falling in Love at the Same […]

TANGREN Held a Special Screening Event for Romantic Movie Fall in Love at First Kiss at Sunnybank Hoyts on 16 February

A special screening event of Fall in Love at First Kisswas held in Sunnybank Hoyts by Tangen Cultural Film Group (TANGREN) on 16 February. This provided as an ideal option for lovers and couples to spend their Valentine’s weekend.Fall in Love at First Kiss gathered people to retrospect their youth memories and to always believe […]

Behind-the-scenes Video of Integrity Shows Mutual Praise between Cast

Recently, another behind-the-scenes video of Hong Kong crime movie Integrityhas been released, showing mutual praise between the cast of the film. Directed by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chong, the movie starred Sean Lau, Nick Cheung and Karena Lam, all of whom are award-winning actors with solid acting skills and considerable filming experience. In […]

HK Star Actor Nick Cheung Displayed Solid Acting Talent in Integrity

Directed by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chong, Hong Kong crime film Integrity is going to debut during the 2019 Lunar New Year holidays. The film features Hong Kong Star Actor Nick Cheung as the key witness Hui Chik-yiu, who flies to Australia to avoid the trial. Since many scenes were actually filmed in […]

Fall in Love at First Kiss Released its Behind-the-scenes Video Titled Let’s Fall in Love

In the latest release video titled Let’s Fall in Love, Dalu Wang and Yun Lin started their love experience and they were ready to say goodbye to their single lives. Wang and Lin were waiting for each other in a house surrounded by trees. They were about to be lovers and to experience love in […]

Integrity Races for Box-office Glory and It Symbolises the Rise of Hong Kong Film

Chinese Spring Festival season is a perfect timing for potential titles to race for box-office glory. 2019 Chinese Spring Festival gathers a clutch of films to hit the big screen from the first day of the Chinese New Year. Among different types of films released during the Spring Festival Holidays, Integrity is of different style, […]

Director Chen Recreated True Love in Highly Anticipated Romantic Film Fall in Love at First Kiss

With Valentine’s Day around the corner, Fall in Love at First Kiss, a romantic film directed by Yushan Chen, is highly anticipated by moviegoers. Portraying the classic love story between Zhishu Jiang and Xiangqin Yuan, this film is a must-see for all couples, lovebirds and lovers-to-be! Yushan Chen directing the film You might not be […]

Kissing Scenes of Fall in Love at First Kiss were Unveiled, and Mr and Mrs Jiang Engage in Public Display of Affection

A behind-the-scene video regarding the kiss scenes of Fall in Love at the First Kiss were unveiled recently. It can be seen from the video that Zhishu Jiang (Dalu Wang) and Xiangqin Yuan (Yun Lin) are keep kissing each other. It seems like their lips are stuck by glue. Wang and Yuan joked that they […]

Integrity – The Highly Anticipated Chinese New Year Film Starring Sean Lau will be in Cinemas This Spring Festival

Integrity, the highly anticipated Chinese New Year film of emperor entertainment, directed by Alan Mak, produced by Felix Chong and Ronald Wong, starring Sean Lau, Nick Cheung, and Karena Lam, will be in overseas cinemas this Spring Festival! Official Poster of Integrity Sean Lau, the “Prince Charming in Black Horse” There are many highlights of […]

Fall in Love at First Kiss – The Chemical is There, making the Impossible Possible!

There have been several versions of Fall in Love at First Kiss before, and they have all left a deep impression on their audience’s minds. The handsome and intelligent Zhishu Jiang has become the ideal boyfriend to many girls. However, he lost his cool when he is with the adorable and dorky Xiangqin Yuan. It […]

The Big Winner of Miss Hong Kong Pageant Anita Yuen Joined Integrity which Spoke Against Corruption

Anita Yuen is Hong Kong actress. In1990, Yue became the big winner of Miss Hong Kong Pageant and won the Miss Photogenic Award, then she started her career in the show business. In 1992, Yue met Julian Cheung, a Hong Kong actor and singer. They got married in the U.S. in 2001 and gave birth […]

Best Actress Winner of Golden Horse Award and Hong Kong Film Award Starred in a Hong Kong Crime Film

Karena Lam is the lead female role in the upcoming Hong Kong Crime film of Integrity, which will be released in cinemas during 2019 Chinese New Year. Karena Lam is a Taiwanese-Canadian actress and singer based in Hong Kong. She was born in Canada. Karena Lam was discovered by a talent scout when she was […]

Fall in Love at First Kiss: The Love Story between an IQ200 and a “Fighter”

Valentine’s Day is around the corner, the romantic campus film Fall in Love at First Kiss directed by Yushan Chen, the Taiwanese director who is most famous for her previous romantic comedies will be in cinemas soon! A short while ago, an official poster themed on “Full of You” was released. In the poster, Xiangqin […]

Yun Lin Swims Against the Current, From Little Mermaid to Showbiz Celebrity

Yun Lin (born Xia Fei) is known for her role as the female lead in the 2016 film The Mermaid directed by Stephen Chow. The Mermaid launched Lin to fame. Lin has been practising dancing and swimming since her young age. She was a model, and her broker encouraged her to shoot some magazine covers […]

A Behind-the-Scenes Video Released, Unveiling Stories that Inspired Integrity

A behind-the-scenes video of Hong Kong crime movie Integrity was recently released, unveiling the stories that inspired the production and allowing viewers to preview some of the important issues that the movie is going to convey. Directed by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chong, the film centres on a cigarette smuggling case investigated by the ICAC […]

Sean Lau, Nick Cheung and Karena Lam went through Fire and Water for Integrity

Directed by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chong, Hong Kong crime film Integrity is ready to enter the fierce competition during the Chinese Spring Festival. Not only does it have an impressive storyline and a strong cast list, but the production team also paid much attention to the filming techniques and all the details […]

High School Hunks Ready to Catch Your Eye on Valentine’s Day

Dalu Wang, a Taiwanese actor well-known as the school bully Taiyu Xu in Our Times, is now playing the genius high school hunk Zhishu Jiang in Love at First Kiss. The movie is directed by the Godmother of Idol Drama, Yushan Chen, and is scheduled to be released on the upcoming Valentine’s Day to bring […]

Fall in Love at First Kiss Releases the Final Poster, Depicting the Sweetest Teen Love

Directed by Yushan Chen, the romantic film Fall in Love at First Kiss, starring Dalu Wang and Yun Lin, is scheduled to be released on the Valentine’s Day, 2019. Today, the final poster of the film was released, depicting the sweetest teen love. In the poster, Wang lovingly caressed Lin’s hair, while Lin leaned against his […]

In Pursuit of Greater Precision, Director Mak Filmed Integrity in Australia

Directed and written by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chong, the crime film Integrity will be released during the Chinese New Year holidays in 2019. In the movie, Hui Chik-yiu (starring Nick Cheung) flies to Australia to avoid the trial, and Shirley Jiang (starring Karena Lam) chases him overseas, trying to convince him to […]

Mysteries Uncovered at the Press Release of the Chinese New Year Film Integrity

Recently, the press release of Integrity, an anti-corruption film that is set to be released on Chinese New Year was a complete success. Creators of the film went onto the stage and created a buzz for Integrity. Press Release of Integrity How I Came up with Integrity When asked why he wanted to shoot a film […]

Godmother of Idol Drama Recreated Classic Love Story Love at First Kiss

Directed by Yushan Chen, the Godmother of Idol Drama, a romantic movie named Love at First Kiss is going to hit the big screen on Valentine’s Day this year. The film is adapted from the classic Japanese comics Itazura na Kiss, which tells the love story of how the courageous girl Yuan Xiangqin pursues her […]

A New Film of Yushan Chen: A Familiar and Different Taste of Sweetness

The Official Poster of Fall in Love at First Kiss Fall in Love at First Kiss, directed by Our Times’ director Yushan Chen, starring Dalu Wang and Yun Lin, will be in cinemas on Valentine’s Day in United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, and New Zealand at the same time. Yushan Chen, famous for her successful […]

Alan Mak and Felix Chong, the Gold Partners in Hong Kong’s Film Industry

The Official Poster of Integrity Integrity, theanti-corruption film written and directed by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chongwill be released during 2019 Chinese New Year in Australia, New Zealand, United States, Canada, and UK by Tangren Cultural Film Group. This film has been highly anticipated by extensive moviegoers not only because of its mysterious […]

Based on a real story, Integrity Unveils an HK$ 8.5B Cigarette Smuggling Case

The story of Integrity revolves around a cigarette smuggling case. Instead of a fiction created by the director and screenwriter Alan Mak, it is actually adapted from a real case took place between 1994 to 1995. The case involved HK$ 8.5 billion and was very sensational. What was even more sensational is that a tainted […]

Integrity is Coming up in Theatres and will Become the Must-see Film in Chinese New Year

In the crime film Integrity directed by Alan Mak and produced by Felix Chong, the Big Three: Sean Lau, Nick Cheung and Karena Lam unveils the secret of cigarette smuggling in Hong Kong and Macau. The story revolves around a bribery case where a cigarette trading group bribed the customs, the defendant suddenly absconded before […]

Dalu Wang Starred as Genius “Zhishu Jiang” in Fall in Love at First Kiss

A new romantic movie named Fall in Love at First Kiss is scheduled to be released on 14th February. Starring Dalu Wang and Yun Lin, this film is directed by Yushan Chen, who is also the director of Our Times. Today, a video marking the “X-Change of Zhishu Jiang” is released, which reconstructs the behind-the-scenes […]

Integrity—Brother’s Words Became a Line, Uncovering Unknown Childhood Story

Alan Mak in Taiwan Nick Cheung as the accountant named Hui Chik-yiu in the film. This character originates from a certain brother of the director, who used to practice accounting related work. “This brother is nine years older than me and went to UK to study when I was young. Later on, he came back […]

Integrity — the Highly Anticipated Chinese New Year Film from Emperor Entertainment

Integrity, the highly anticipated Chinese New Year film of emperor entertainment, is known as the golden film of this Spring Festival. It was directed by Alan Mak, produced by Felix Chong and Ronald Wong, starring Sean Lau, Nick Cheung, Karena Lam, Anita Yuen, Alex Fong, Carlos Chan, and Kathy Yuen. Alan Mak in Taiwan Recently, […]

Lala Hsu Sings for the MV of Love at First Kiss, Dedicated to All “Lovefools”

Directed by Yushan Chen, the romantic film Love at First Kiss, starring Dalu Wang and Yun Lin, is scheduled to be released on the Valentine’s Day, 2019. Lately, a music video of the theme song “Foolishly in Love”(真的傻) was released. Composed by the composer of “A Little Happiness” (小幸运) JerryC and sang by Lala Hsu, […]

Fall in Love at First Kiss – Remake of a Classic IP Makes You Fall in Love This Valentine’s Day

Fall in Love at First Kiss – Remake of a Classic IP Makes You Fall in Love This Valentine’s Day Fall in Love at First Kiss is directed by Yushan Chen and will be released on 14 February 2019, which is the valentine’s day. Fall in Love at First Kiss will get you ready […]

Find the “Little Girl” in Your Heart, Uncover Yushan Chen’s Fall in Love at First Kiss

Fall in Love at First Kiss, a romantic film that will be released during this Valentine’s Day. What a perfect match. Yushan Chen, whose last film Our Times once started a pink frenzy and woke up the little girls hidden in many female viewers, directed this film. Her other works include over 20 popular dramas […]

New Movie Posters of Fall in Love at First Kiss Unveiled, Starting Countdown to 2019 Valentine’s Day

The Official Poster of Fall in Love at First Kiss The first trailer and a movie poster have been released for Fall in Love at First Kiss. Fall in Love at First Kiss is the second film directed by Yushan Chen. It will hit the big screen on the Valentine’s Day. The film is highly […]

IP Works Became A Big Hit in China, and the Rise of IP Reflects the Prosperity of Chinese Film Industry

The term IP is frequently used by Chinse film industry. Many people may have no idea about what the IP is. Actually, IP stands for Intellectual Property. Chinese IP films are intellectual property adaptations based on famous novels, video games and music. Usually, a well-known IP work have a large legion of fans. The most […]

Hong Kong Film Trilogy Integrity is Ready to Blow Your Mind with the Upcoming Sequels

As a branch of Chinese movies, Hong Kong films are well developed and have always been a symbol of the long-lasting Chinese culture. Previously colonised by the British, Hong Kong enjoyed more freedom for creativity than other parts of China in the late 20th century. In fact, it was known as one of the four […]

With Over RMB100 Million Box Office, the Chinese IP Film Mojin Has Blown Everyone’s Mind

As a sequel to the Chronicles of the Ghostly Tribe directed by Lu Chuan and the Mojin: The Lost Legend directed by Wuershan in 2015, Mojin: The Worm Valley, an adapted film from one of China’s best-selling novel series Ghost Blows Out the Light, officially landed on Australia and New Zealand on 3 Jan 2019. […]

The Chinese Remake of Perfect Strangers Surpassed 600million yuan

On 29 Dec 2018, Kill Mobile was released simultaneously to 18 theaters of Australia and 92,852 theaters of China. As of 16 Jan 2019, the earnings of Kill Mobile, the Chinese remake of Perfect Strangers, in China stood at around 612 million yuan. The Official Poster of Kill Mobile Kill Mobile was adapted from Perfect […]

Cast Members in the Film of Integrity Shared Their Behind-the-scenes Stories and Filming Experience

Production for the first installment of a planned trilogy Integrity, directed and wrote by Hong Kong director Alan Mak, officially ended on 24 July 2018 and the film is upcoming soon. Albert Yeung – the Chairman of Emperor Group The leading female role was played by Karena Lam and her co-star in this film were […]

Hong Kong Crime Film Integrity is Set to Kick off Chinese Spring Festival Season in February 2019

An upcoming Hong Kong crime film Integritywill be in cinemas to kick off Chinese Spring Festival Season in February 2019. The film is directed by Alan Makand produced by Felix Chong. The production company of Integrityare Emperor Motion Pictures and Stellar Mega Films. The main cast members in the film featuresSean Lau, Nick Cheung and […]

Romance Film Fall in Love at First Kiss is Ready to Debut on Valentine’s Day 2019

Official Poster for Fall in Love at First Kiss Aromance filmFall in Love at First Kissis ready to make its big debut on Valentine’s Day 2019.The film is starring Dalu Wang and Yun Lin, directed by Frankie Chen and produced by New Classics Media, Tianjin Maoyan Weiying Media, Huaxia Film Distribution, Wanda Media […]

Europe Raiders – Tony Leung Returned in the Third Installment of the “Raiders” Series

Europe Raiders is an action-comedy film and it is the third instalmetn in the Jingle Ma-directed franchise, following Tokyo Raiders (2000) and Seoul Raiders (2006).

The Negotiation – Hyun Bin Plays Antagonist for the First Time in His Acting Career

Hyun Bin (born Kim Tae-pyung) was born on 25 September 1982, and he is a South Korean actor. He is well-known for his leading roles in the television dramas My Name is Kim Sam-soon (2005), Worlds Within (2008), Secret Garden (2010–2011), Memories of the Alhambra (2018–2019); as well as the film Confidential Assignment and The Swindlers (2017).

Kill Mobile Ranked as the Top-grossing Film Released during 2019 New Year Season

Opened on 28th of December in North America and 29th of December in Australia and New Zealand, Kill Mobile has become the biggest box office hit compared with the other Asian films released during the 2019 New Year season. Distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group in the USA, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand, Kill Mobile attracted over thousands of audiences to watch the movie in cinemas, and due to the positive word-of-mouth, the number of audiences is still overwhelming. Kill Mobile is undoubtfully becoming the No.1 title during 2019 New Year season.

Korean Fantasy Movie Along with the Gods: The Two Worlds was Successfully Released Worldwide

Highly praised Korean fantasy movie Along with the Gods: The Two Worlds was exclusively distributed by the Tangren Culture Film Group in Australia and New Zealand on January 11, 2018.

The Accidental Detective 2: In Action Reveals the Dark Side of Modern Society

The Accidental Detective 2: In Action is a 2018 South Korean crime comedy film and sequel to 2015 comedy film The Accidental Detective: The Beginning. The film was directed by Lee Eon-hee, starring Kwon Sang-woo, Sung Dong-il and Lee Kwang-soo and was released on 19 July 2018 in Australia and New Zealand.

Brother of the Year – The best Thai Movie about Siblings in 2018

Brother of the Year is a Thai comedy film released in 2018. The film was distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group in Australian, New Zealand and North America on July 12, 2018. This amazing romantic comedy film was directed by Vithaya Thongyuyong, starring Sunny Suwanmethanont, Urassaya Sperbund, Nichkhun.

Insidious Marketing Tactics in The Leakers: Spreading Epidemic Virus and Selling Vaccines

Released on 21June, 2018 in Hong Kong, the Leakers was directed by Herman Yau and was jointly produced by Mainland China and Hong Kong. The film stars Francis Ng, Julian Cheung, Charmaine Sheh, Kent Cheung, Wilfred Lau, Chrissie Chau, and Louis Cheung.

Inuyashiki Live-action Film – Never Underestimate Senior Citizens since They Have Eaten More Salt than You have of Rice

The live-action film adaptation of Oku Hiroya’s sci-fi manga Inuyashiki was officially released on April 20, 2018 in Japan. The film was directed by Satou Shinsuke. In the film, Inuyashiki (Noritake Kinashi) came across a murderous antagonist, Shishigami Hiro (Satou Takeru), who experienced the same transformation as he did.

How long will I love You – A Love Adventure Beyond Time and Space

Produced by Zheng Xu and directed by Su Lun, the comedy love fantasy film How long will I love You stars Jiayin Lei and Liya Tong. The film was distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group on May 18, 2018 in Australia and New Zealand.

Every Decision is Life or Death – Making Choices in A or B Without Time to Think Twice

An unexpected box-office hit, A or B, caught audiences eyes during the screening season of Chinese Labour Day in 2018. A or B is a crime film that was distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group in Australia and New Zealand on 3 May 2018.

Kill Mobile Provokes People into Thinking Seriously about Trust Issue

Directed by Yu Miao and Produced by Zhang Yibai, Kill Mobile features a roster of veterans, including Tong Dawei, Ma Li, Ming Xi, Huo Siyan, Qiao Shan, Tian Yu and Dai Lele.

Mojin: The Worm Valley – Join Hands with TANGREN to Start a Journey of Adventure in Cinemas

Tangren Cultural Film Group (TANGREN) held a private screening event for the film of Mojin: The Worm Valley on 30 December 2018 in Sunnybank Hoyts. A large number of filmgoers were waiting in a line to enter the cinema. This event lighted up film lovers’ Christmas and New Year festival in this holiday season.

Kill Mobile Premiere Event was Held by TANGREN in Sunnybank Hoyts on 29 December 2018

Hundreds of people gathered in Sunnybank Hoyts on 29 December to join the private screening event of Kill Mobile held by Tangren Cultural Film Group (TANGREN). The scheduled screening time of the movie was 6pm, and there was a huge crowd gathered at the cinema around 5 pm. The event was overwhelmed by people’s enthusiasm.

Mojin Six Take You to the Tomb of an Ancient King – A World with Unknown Dangerous

The film of Moji is directed by Fei Xing and will be released on 29 December 2018. The film revolves around six people’s adventure. Some new posters were published recently, which reveals a totally different world.

New Movie Posters of Mojin was Released Recently – the Pontifex Maximus Comes to the Screen for the First Time

Mojin is adapted from the novel of the Adventures of Three Tomb Raiders: Yunnan Worm Valley. The recently released poster has shown the pontifex maximus. Many fans start to question whether if she is still alive or not.

Director of Legend of the Demon Cat Reconstructed an Entire City for Filming

Legend of the Demon Cat is a 2017 fantasy mystery film directed by Chen Kaige. In order to capture the actuality of Tang dynasty, the filmmaker decided to reconstruct an entire Chang’an City, which was the ancient capital of more than ten dynasties in Chinese history.

The Negotiation – South Korean First Negotiation-themed Suspension Caught Fan’s Eyes

The Negotiation was distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group in Australia and New Zealand. The film centres on a story of a negotiator Ha Chae-yun (Son Ye-jin) from the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency’s crisis negotiating team and an arms dealer who kidnaps two Koreans hostages. The film is known to have been made with a budget of $8.8 million. It finished its theatrical run with $14.88 million box office gross from 1.96 million admissions.

Ma Dong-Seok —— The Supporting Actor in Train to Busan has Become the Busiest Actor

Ma Dong-Seok is back once again doing what he does best in his comedy-drama film. The new title is the Soul-Mate (also known as Wonderful Ghost).

Each Soul Has A Perfect Match – The Soul-Mate Opened in Australia and New Zealand on 11 October 2018

Winning the 39th Blue Dragon Film Awards, The Soul-Mate was distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group on 11 October 2018 in Australia and New Zealand. This film was directed by Jo Won-hee and was written by Kim Sung-jin.

Gintama 2: Rules Are Made to Be Broken – Japanese Comedy in Live-action Manga Adaptation

Gintama 2: Okite wa Yaburu Tame ni Koso Aru (Rules Are Made to Be Broken), the second live-action film based on Hideaki Sorachi’ s Gintama manga, earned more than 3.5 billion yen (about US$30.77 million) as of October 2. The film opened in Japan on August 17 in 345 theaters, it then became the third highest-earning Japanese live-action film this year after Gekijōban Code Blue -Doctor Heli Kinkyū Kyūmei- and Shoplifters.

Curiosity Can Not Only Kill Cat, But Also Can Kill Mobile – Trying to Figure Out Secrets Hidden in Your Partner’s Phone

Curiosity is the desire to know about new things and the desire to acquire the information that you don’t know. Everyone is curious about something. So are the couple in the film of Kill Mobile.

Behind-the-Scenes Stories of Cry Me A Sad River – Director Luoluo Reviewed Filming Stories with Film Cast and Crew

Director Luoluo released the behind-the-scenes stories of Cry Me A Sad River recently. The box office of this film surpassed 200 million RMB after 10-days in release. What the box office success brought to director Luo Luo is not a reason to show off, but a spirit of gratitude.

Intimate Strangers Became the Only Korean Comedy Film of 2018 with More Than 4 Million Moviegoers

Korean comedy Intimate Strangers landed in top one of South Korea’s box office in the opening weekend with more than $9 million from 1 million admissions. The film released by The Lotte Culture works earned a total of $38,870,767 nationwide in South Korea.

Big Fish & Begonia – Chinese Animated Epic Fantasy Film in Brisbane International Film Festival

The Brisbane International Film Festival (BIFF) has long been a vital moment in the city’s cultural calendar, a time for cinema lovers to congregate, contemplate and debate screen culture.

How Long Will I Love You Sprang a Surprise at the Box Office with 136.7 million USD worldwide

The one-day summary of the box office of How Long Will I Love You was more than 100 million RMB. It was the top grossing movie in a single day at the box office compared with other movies released at the same time period.

Director of Cry Me A Sad River Received Compliment from Chinese Film Watchers

Cry Me A Sad River opened on 21 September, and the movie became a box office hit. The box office reached 320 million RMB. Director Luo Luo expressed her sincere thanks to everyone’s support and encouragement.

Kill Mobile –Superstar Tong Dawei and Supermodel Ming Xi Fall in Love with Each Other

Actor Tong Dawei (Jia Di) and international supermodel Ming Xi (Bai Xuejiao) acted as a couple in the comedy film Kill Mobile. The official poster was published today.

The 17th China Huabiao Film Awards-Chinese Films Win the Outstanding Film Award

The 17th China Huabiao Film Awards ceremony was held on 8 December 2018 in Beijing. Nearly 300 film practitioners gathered in the Water Cube. Operation Red Sea and the other nine films won the Outstanding Film Awards.

Together with Tangren Cultural Film Group, Joining Japanese Film Festival Australia

Tangren Cultural Film Group (TANGREN) sponsored the 22nd Japanese Film Festival Australia (JFF Australia) in 2018. As one of the most important media partners of JFF, Tangren Cultural Film Group is committed to introducing high-quality Asian movies, promoting Asian culture and increasing the awareness of JFF.

American Film Market Attracted A Large Number of Film Distributors Worldwide

At the beginning of November, Tangren Cultural Film Group (TAGNREN) was invited to attend the American Film Market (AFM) which was held in Santa Monica. AFM is the world’s largest motion picture business event. More than 7000 industry leaders converge in Santa Monica for eight days of deal-making, screenings, conferences, networking and parties. TAGNREN has enhanced its brand image as well as demonstrated the excellent brand promotion ability through AFM.

AACTA Provides an Exciting Time of Growth for the Neighbouring Film Industries of China and Australia

The 8th AACTA International Awards was held in Sydney recently. Chinese film Dying to Survive defeated Japanese film Shoplifters and became the winner of the Best Asian Film Award. This award is one of the top prizes of Australian cinema and television arts awards, also known as “Australian Oscars”. Chinese filmmakers made AACTA Award history as the first time to be the winner of the Best Asian Film Award.

TANGREN and Company A Held Premiere Events of Fat Buddies in Auckland, New Zealand, and in Seven Major Cities in Australia Simultaneously.

Fat Buddies is an action comedy movie, staring Wen Zhang and Bao Beier. The premiere events were held at Sydney Event George St, Hoyts Melbourne Central and Brisbane Event Myer City at the same time!

Along with the Gods: The Last 49 Days Premiere Event Achieved Great Success in Melbourne

The film of Along with the Gods: The Two Worlds was adapted from the smash-hit comic book Along with the Gods written and drawn by cartoonist Joo Ho-min. Along with the Gods is the first instalment of the two-part series, which opened at the end of 2017. The second one, Along with the Gods: The Last 49 Days, was released in Korean on 1 August, 2018. The heart-warming storyline and the wonderful cast left movie lovers powerful messages. The film became a hot topic of conversation in Korea.

The premiere of A or B held by Tangren Cultural Film Group is in Melbourne

A or B is released in Australia and New Zealand and it is distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group. The premiere held by Tangren Cultural Film Group is in Melbourne on 3 May.

The free movie, A or B, watching event is held in Brisbane

A or B is released in Australia and New Zealand and it is distributed by Tangren Cultural Film Group. The free movie watching event is held in Brisbane with thousands of participants and the event is exclusively sponsored by SOL Edu & Migration.
